title: Penalty for obstruction
context: ยง96-19 Penalty for obstruction. A person who willfully hinders the lawful actions of the ombudsman or the ombudsman&rsquo;s staff, or willfully refuses to comply with their lawful demands, shall be fined not more than $1,000. [L 1967, c 306, ยง20; HRS ยง96-19; gen ch 1985]
